title: ShopLocal
description: Shop Local is an early prototype of an ecommerce application. Consumers can search for goods locally and merchants can login and manage inventory and business information.

title: UCR Coin Laundry
description: Simple static site for a laundromat using a Bootstrap template that I converted to Jekyll.

title: CPS Uninterruptible Power
description: Static site using a Bootstrap template with Jekyll. Minimal scripting for form validation and some animation.

title: VEXTit
description: Prototype for an upcoming project VEXTit. Simple landing page using Bootstrap 4.

title: Allyson Jeffredo's Site
description: Work in progress. Allyson's personal site displaying her published works and resume.  Need to contact her? Visit her site and leave her a message.

title: Lotus 2 Salon
description: Static, informational site for a hair salon. Used a Bootstrap 3 template and converted it to Jekyll.
